spindex.core package¶

Submodules¶

spindex.core.data_providers Data containers for a spatially indexed collection of geometric shapes.
spindex.core.enclosing_geometry Enclosing geometry classes.
spindex.core.spatial_index Spatial Index data structure and algorithms.
spindex.core.spatial_joins Spatial joins using indexing.
